issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
Create and Run Arrow Project
Past Admin URL from Studio console message: i.e.
http://127.0.0.1:<some port number>/arrow

h3. Actual Result
URL pasted into browser redirects to https://platform.appcelerator.com/?redirect=http://127.0.0.1:<some port number>/arrow/index.html

h3. Expected Result
URL pasted into browser should display local arrow admin
fields.summary: After creating an Arrow in Studio 4.0.0, cannot run Arrow admin from Studio 4.0.0

comments.body:
Hi,

I have tested this issue in updated environment. We could not reproduce this as a platform bug.

*Test Environments:*

Appcelerator Command-Line Interface, version 4.1.2
Appc Studio: Appcelerator Studio, build: 4.1.1.201507141126
Alloy: 1.7.3



*Test Steps:*

1.Create and Run Arrow Project.
2.Paste Admin URL from Studio console message: i.e  http://127.0.0.1:50869/arrow into a browser.

*Test Results:*

1. Able to run successfully Arrow admin from Studio, redirect to http://127.0.0.1:50869/arrow when we are already logged into platform.appcelerator.com .
2. If we are not logging on before running the project, we are redirected to https://platform.appcelerator.com/?redirect=http://127.0.0.1:<some port number>/arrow/index.html  for performing login functionality. This is expected behavior.

Thanks
